DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to measure the frequency, functionality and phenotype of bone marrow-derived mesenchymal stromal cells in patients after allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation. Furthermore, the immune cell infiltrate of the bone marrow will be monitored at the same time. These results will be correlated with the extent of cytopenia and clinical graft-versus-host disease grading.
DOC.criteria: age >18 acute myeloid leukemia myelodysplastic syndrome hematopoietic stem cell transplantation not willing to take part
